comments:
Using eclipse-SDK-I20050126-0800-win32.zip and extracting it under 
"C:\Program Files" will result in a non-startable Eclipse.

An analysis of the code indicates that it is likely that the space in the
installation path is causing the trouble. Installing eclipse directly under
"C:\" works fine, but is 'untidy'. Previous versions (3.1M4) has not had this
problem.
